title: BIMS Web System
long_desc: A comprehensive web-based system designed to manage barangay records, including population, voters, blotter records, and certificate issuance.

title: Nicole's Pasalubong Shop
short_desc: E-commerce landing page for local delicacies.
long_desc: A vibrant e-commerce interface designed for a local pasalubong shop, featuring a clean layout for showcasing products.

title: MJ's Moto Shop
short_desc: Automotive parts and accessories shop interface.
long_desc: A sleek, dark-themed website design for a motorcycle parts and accessories shop, emphasizing high-quality visuals.

title: Tech Find
short_desc: Interactive word search game built in VB.NET.
long_desc: A desktop application game developed using VB.NET where players find technology-related words within a grid.

title: Memory Savior
long_desc: A game application built with VB.NET featuring user profiles, leaderboards, and varying difficulty levels.

title: Find and Collect
long_desc: An interactive desktop game where players must locate specific items within various scenes. Built using VB.NET.

title: Memory Match
long_desc: A web-based implementation of the classic memory matching game, testing user recall and concentration.

title: Shuffle Text Game
long_desc: A simple yet addictive word game where users must unscramble jumbled letters to form the correct word.

title: Tic Tac Toe
short_desc: Modern UI version of the classic game.
long_desc: A clean, dark-themed web version of Tic Tac Toe with restart functionality and game state management.

title: Simple Calculator
long_desc: A fully functional calculator with a modern dark UI, capable of handling basic arithmetic operations.

title: Portfolio V2
long_desc: A minimalist, dark-themed personal website design focused on typography and essential information.

title: ASUS Landing Page Concept
long_desc: A responsive landing page design concept inspired by ASUS, focusing on clean product presentation.

title: ACLC Hawks Jersey
short_desc: Sports jersey design for ACLC Naga.
long_desc: Full sublimation basketball jersey design featuring the ACLC Hawks branding with a modern geometric pattern.

title: Jaguar Riders Club

title: SKR Riders

title: Geng Geng Moto Club

title: Sepak Takraw League

title: Brgy. Cabusay SK

title: Tabagwang Festival Shirt

title: Calmateo Reunion

title: TBRC Logo

title: Film Poster: Infidelity
